pli-tv-bu-vb-sk25:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk25:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk25:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
